title: Anaemia
content:
# Anaemia
### Key points about anaemia
  * Anaemia occurs when you don't have enough healthy red blood cells to carry the oxygen you need around your body.
  * If you have anaemia you may feel tired, light headed and weak.
  * The most common types are iron deficiency anaemia and anaemia of chronic disease.


![Tired woman at gym](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Exercise/Tired-woman-at-gym-canva-950x690.jpg)
####  What is anaemia? 
The red blood cells in your blood contain an iron-rich protein called haemoglobin. The haemoglobin helps carry oxygen from the lungs to your bodyâ€™s tissues.
